    Split RasterLayer into smaller tiles

    split_dem.Rd

    Split RasterLayer into smaller tiles

    split_dem(data, size, parallel = FALSE, ncores = (parallel::detectCores() - 1))

    Arguments

    data

    RasterLayer

    size

    size of tiles, relative to the unit of the RasterLayer

    parallel

    TRUE or FALSE. Use parallel processing? Note: parallel must be installed.

    ncores

    number of cores to use when parallel = TRUE.

    Value

    List of RasterLayers

    Examples

    L <- raster::res(horseshoe)[1] * nrow(horseshoe) # size of horseshoe = 8m
size <- 2 # size of target tiles
(L / size)^2 # number of target tiles = 16
#> [1] 16
dem_list <- split_dem(horseshoe, 2)
length(dem_list)
#> [1] 16
sapply(dem_list, hr) # apply height range calculation on each tile
#>  [1] 0.5162930 0.6127143 0.8358884 0.8814073 0.6774140 0.9377822 0.9958876
#>  [8] 0.9770845 1.1133886 1.0766171 1.1218033 1.0029795 0.9865971 1.1646364
#> [15] 0.9986641 1.3692834
